body_html: looks like comparisons require the rich comparison function to be defined, but number methods only require the number protocol if PyNumber_Check passes (which it currently doesn't). So I'm going to move the comparison functions back to variable.py (calling the VariableBase methods). We can look at implementing the number protocol when we expose scalars.

So I'm going to move the comparison functions back to variable.py (calling the VariableBase methods).  We can look at implementing the number protocol when we expose scalars.
body: looks like comparisons require the rich comparison function to be defined, but number methods only require the number protocol if PyNumber_Check passes (which it currently doesn't).  So I'm going to move the comparison functions back to variable.py (calling the VariableBase methods).  We can look at implementing the number protocol when we expose scalars.
